Comments.MaxConcurrentFileLoads: Maximum number of Excel files to load simultaneously. Higher values = faster batch loading but more memory usage. Recommended: 3-5 for typical systems.

Comments.DefaultStrategy: Strategy for handling merged cells. Options: ExpandValue (replicate value in all cells), KeepTopLeft (only top-left has value), FlattenToString (concatenate), TreatAsHeader (auto-detect)
Comments.WarnThresholdPercentage: Warn user if more than this percentage of cells are merged (indicates potential data quality issues)

Comments.SampleSize: Number of cells to sample per column for type detection. Higher = more accurate but slower. Recommended: 100-200
Comments.ConfidenceThreshold: Minimum confidence score (0.0-1.0) to classify column as strong type. >0.8 = strong, <0.8 = mixed
Comments.MaxHeaderRows: Maximum number of rows to scan for headers during auto-detection. Typical: 10-20, scientific datasets: 50+

Comments.EnableDateNormalization: Normalize date formats (Excel serial, US/EU formats, ISO). Improves search accuracy +20%
Comments.EnableCurrencyDetection: Detect and parse currency symbols from number formats. Critical for financial data comparison
Comments.EnableBooleanNormalization: Normalize boolean variations (Yes/No, 1/0, TRUE/FALSE, X/blank) to true/false
Comments.EnableTextCleaning: Clean text values (trim whitespace, remove zero-width characters). Improves search accuracy +10%
